author: Jean-pierre Declemy
content: A textured hull in a high sediment estuary would soon see the barnacle resistant texture coated in mud and be rendered useless. A problem we have with all current antifouls. üôÅ

author: Carolina Salguero
content: Once upon a time, a marine coatings business in Red Hook, Brooklyn had a huge collection of barnacles, part of their study into how to defeat these critters https://redhookwaterstories.org/items/show/63
